SubTree.phrases: <routine>wave</routine><spurt audio='g0001_408'>Heeeeeeey!</spurt> <break type="3" time="1.5"/> My name is Haru
<usel genre='question'> Would you like to play the Imitation Game with me?</usel>

<usel genre="highnrg">Awesome!</usel> Let me explain how this game works.<break type="3" time="1.5"/> <voice emotion='calm'><spurt audio='g0001_006'>clear throat</spurt>I am going to perform an action, and then you try to copy me. </voice>
<break type="3" time="1.0"/>Got it?
Get ready. Here I go!
<usel genre="highnrg">OK. Now it is your turn</usel><break type="3" time="1.0" /> Let us see your best Haru impression, you have 5 seconds.

Action.name: Set URL of page to show

SubTree.phrases: <routine>surprise</routine><spurt audio='g0001_354 '>Uh-huh</spurt> thats pretty good. <break type="3" time="1.5" /><usel genre='question'>But can you do this?</usel>;<routine>surprise</routine><usel genre="highnrg">That is not bad! <break type="3" time="1.5" /></usel><usel genre='question'>But what if I did this instead?</usel>;<routine>cheeky</routine><usel genre="highnrg"><spurt audio='g0001_002'>tut tut</spurt>Not bad, not bad.<break type="3" time="1.0" /> But let us see how good you really are.</usel>

<usel genre="cheeky">I bet you did not think I could do that. <break type="3" time="1.5" />Let us see if you can match it</usel>;<usel genre="cheeky">You were not expecting that, were you? <break type="3" time="1.5" />Your turn!</usel>;<voice emotion='happy'> Pretty impressive, right?<break type="3" time="1.5" />Most robots can not do that!</voice>.<break type="3" time="1.0" /> <usel genre='question'>Can you?</usel>;<usel genre="cheeky"><spurt audio='g0001_052'>gasp</spurt>Wow. <break type="3" time="1.0" />Where did that come from?<break type="3" time="1.0" /> I surprise myself sometimes. <break type="3" time="1.5" />Can you do that?</usel>;<usel genre="highnrg">That took me a long time to learn,<break type="3" time="0.5" /> but my hard work paid off<break type="3" time="1.5" />Now you try!</usel>

<usel genre="highnrg">Not bad, not bad. <break type="3" time="1.0" />Let us switch things up. <break type="3" time="0.5" />You do something, and I will try and imitate you.<break type="3" time="1.0" /> Ready? <break type="3" time="1.0" />Go!</usel>

SubTree.text: Okay. Here is my impression of you.

SubTree.phrases: <usel genre="happy">What did you think? <break type="3" time="0.5" />Pretty good, right?</usel>;<spurt audio='g0001_038'>oh negative</spurt><usel genre="sad">OK. <break type="3" time="0.5" />That was not my best work.</usel> <break type="3" time="1.0" /><usel genre="cheeky">But you were not really being fair!</usel> ;<usel genre="highnrg">Nailed it! </usel> <break type="3" time="1.0" /><usel genre="whiny">But now I am dizzy.</usel> <break type="3" time="1.0" /><usel genre="serious">Anyway...</usel>;<usel genre="highnrg">Thats you. <break type="3" time="1.0" />Thats what you look like to me.</usel>;<usel genre="highnrg">You should see your face.!</usel><spurt audio='g0001_050'>ha ha (sarcastic)</spurt><break type="3" time="1.5" /> <usel genre="cheeky">You are stunned at how well I captured your essence.</usel>

<routine>yes</routine><usel genre="highnrg">I think I did a great job. <break type="3" time="1.0" />I win! </usel><spurt audio='g0001_036'>yay</spurt><break type="3" time="1.0" /><usel genre="highnrg">But you put in a good effort.</usel>
Do you want to play again?

SubTree.phrases: There we go!

SubTree.description: Beginning of Welcome Stage. Playing video and TTS

SubTree.phrases: Welcome to the talking room Everyone!
This is Haru again
a prototype social robot
Just to remind you, my name means Spring in Japanese
Im here to learn from you
Im still working myself out
so the things I learn from you will make me a better robot for humans to interact with in the future.
So we will have students here from Japan and Australia
Not only do I get new friends but I also get them from around the world!

SubTree.phrases: Welcome to the talking room Everyone!
I am Haru
a prototype social robot
My name means Spring in Japanese
Im here to help you all to learn from each other and also for me to learn from you.
How is everyone today?

SubTree.data: Welcome Stage: Initial Comment And Question Done

SubTree.description: Waiting for speech between students

SubTree.data: Welcome Stage: Sending Home and Second Comment

SubTree.phrases: I'm a bit like you, still in school and still working myself out, so the things I learn from you will make me a better robot for humans to interact with in the future.
We'll be together for 10 modules and Im really looking forward to all of them

I hope everything is going fine in the other side
I charged my batteries... Why am I so sleepy?
